thread.title: MPs pay tribute to a 'caring and compassionate' colleague
thread.title_full: MPs pay tribute to a 'caring and compassionate' colleague | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: MPs pay tribute to a 'caring and compassionate' colleague
text:
Sadiq Khan MP @SadiqKhan Follow My thoughts are with the family and friends of Michael Meacher. A man of conviction and principle - he'll be missed.
13:55 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Chris Bryant MP @RhonddaBryant Follow Sorry to hear that Michael Meacher MP has died. He was a cordial charming and compassionate colleague. RIP
13:54 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Debbie Abrahams @Debbie_abrahams Follow Devastating news about my friend & colleague, Michael Meacher, the quintessential gentleman. My thoughts are with his family. RIP
13:56 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Ed Miliband @Ed_Miliband Follow Very sad to hear of the death of Michael Meacher. He was principled, kind, thoughtful and deeply committed to a fairer, more just world.
13:59 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 21 Oct 2015 Read more 6 updates Michael Meacher, veteran Labour MP for Oldham West and Royton, dies aged 75 Politics Greater Manchester Michael Meacher
